</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.36
<SEQUENCE>4
<FILENAME>y29219exv10w36.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.36: FORM OF YEAR-END OPTION AWARD AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>EX-10.36</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 9pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>EXHIBIT&nbsp;10.36</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>THE GOLDMAN SACHS AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
STOCK INCENTIVE PLAN</B><BR>
<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> <B>YEAR-END OPTION AWARD</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Award Agreement sets forth the terms and conditions of the <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> year-end award (this
&#147;Award&#148;) of Nonqualified Stock Options (&#147;<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options&#148;) granted to you under The Goldman
Sachs Amended and Restated Stock Incentive Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.&nbsp;<U>The Plan</U>. This Award is made pursuant to the Plan, the terms of which are
incorporated in this Award Agreement. Capitalized terms used in this Award Agreement that
are not defined in this Award Agreement have the meanings as used or defined in the Plan.
References in this Award Agreement to any specific Plan provision shall not be construed as
limiting the applicability of any other Plan provision.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.&nbsp;<U>Award</U>. The Award Statement delivered to you sets forth (i)&nbsp;the Date of Grant of
the <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options, (ii)&nbsp;the number of <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options and (iii)&nbsp;the Exercise Price
of each <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Option. Until shares of Common Stock (&#147;Shares&#148;) are delivered to you
pursuant to Paragraph&nbsp;7 after you exercise your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options, you have no rights as a
shareholder of GS Inc. <FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>This Award is conditioned on your executing the related signature card
and returning it to the address designated and/or by the method specified by the date specified,
and is subject to all terms, conditions and provisions of the Plan and this Award Agreement,
including, without limitation, the arbitration and choice of forum provisions set forth in
Paragraph&nbsp;13</B></FONT>. <FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>By executing the related signature card (which, among other things, opens
the custody account referred to in paragraph 7 if you have not done so
already), you will have confirmed your acceptance of all of the terms and conditions of this Award
Agreement.</B></FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.&nbsp;<U>Expiration Date</U>. The Expiration Date for your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options is November
25, 2016 (in New York). Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Award Agreement, but
subject to earlier termination as provided in this Award Agreement or otherwise in accordance with
the Plan, on the Expiration Date all of your then Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options shall
terminate.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.&nbsp;<U>Vesting</U>.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;<U>In General</U>. Except as provided below in Paragraphs 4(b), 4(c), 4(d), 5(a), 5(b),
10(g), and 11, on each Vesting Date you shall become Vested in the number or percentage of your
<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options specified next to such Vesting Date on the Award Statement (which may be
rounded to avoid fractional Shares). While continued active Employment is not required in order
for your Outstanding Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options to become exercisable, all other terms
and conditions of this Award Agreement shall continue to apply to such Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End
Options, and failure to meet such terms and conditions may result in the termination of this Award
(as a result of which no Shares subject to any such Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options would be
delivered).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;<U>Death</U>. Notwithstanding any other provision of this Award Agreement, if you die
prior to an applicable Vesting Date, as soon as practicable after the date of death and after such
documentation as may be requested by the Committee is provided to the Committee, any such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
Year-End Options that were Outstanding but that had not yet become Vested immediately prior to your
death shall become Vested, but all other conditions of this Award Agreement shall apply.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;<U>Extended Absence, Retirement and Downsizing</U>.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of this Award Agreement, but subject to Paragraph
5(c), in the event of the termination of your Employment (determined as described in Section&nbsp;1.2.19
of the Plan) by reason of Extended Absence or Retirement, the condition set forth in Paragraph 5(a)
shall be waived with respect to any <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options that were Outstanding but that had not
yet become Vested immediately prior to such termination of Employment (as a result of which such
<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options shall become Vested), but all other conditions of this Award Agreement shall
continue to apply.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of this Award Agreement and subject to your executing
such general waiver and release of claims and an agreement to pay any associated tax liability,
both as may be prescribed by the Firm or its designee, if your Employment is terminated without
Cause solely by reason of a &#147;downsizing,&#148; the condition set forth in Paragraph 5(a) shall be waived
with respect to your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options that were Outstanding but that had not yet become Vested
immediately prior to such termination of Employment (as a result of which such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End
Options shall become Vested), but all other conditions of this Award Agreement shall continue to
apply. Whether or not your Employment is terminated solely by reason of a &#147;downsizing&#148; shall be
determined by the Firm in its sole discretion. No termination of Employment initiated by you,
including any termination claimed to be a &#147;constructive termination&#148; or the like or a termination
for good reason, will be solely by reason of a &#147;downsizing.&#148;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;<U>Change in Control</U>. Notwithstanding any other provision of this Award Agreement,
if there is a Change in Control and your Employment terminates as described in Paragraph&nbsp;6(d), the
condition set forth in Paragraph 5(a) shall be waived with respect to any <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options
that were Outstanding but that had not yet become Vested immediately prior to such termination of
Employment (as a result of which such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options shall become Vested), but all other
terms and conditions of this Award Agreement shall continue to apply.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.&nbsp;<U>Termination of <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options Upon Certain Events</U>.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;Unless the Committee determines otherwise, and except as provided in Paragraphs 4(b),
4(c), 4(d) and 10(g), if your Employment terminates for any reason or you otherwise are no
longer actively employed with the Firm, your rights in respect of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options
that were Outstanding but had not yet become Vested immediately prior to your termination of
Employment immediately shall terminate.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;Unless the Committee determines otherwise, your rights in respect of all of your
Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options (whether or not Vested) shall immediately terminate, such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
Year-End Options shall cease to be Outstanding, and no Shares shall be delivered in respect
thereof, if at any time prior to the date you exercise such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;you attempt to have any dispute under the Plan or this Award Agreement resolved in any
manner that is not provided for by Paragraph&nbsp;13 or Section&nbsp;3.17 of the Plan;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;any event that constitutes Cause has occurred;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;(A)&nbsp;you in any manner, directly or indirectly, (1)&nbsp;Solicit any Client to transact
business with a Competitive Enterprise or to reduce or refrain from doing any business with the
Firm, (2)&nbsp;interfere with or damage (or attempt to interfere with or damage) any relationship
between the Firm and any such Client, (3)&nbsp;Solicit any person who is an employee of the Firm to
resign from the Firm or to apply for or accept employment with any Competitive Enterprise or (4)&nbsp;on
behalf of yourself or any person or Competitive Enterprise hire, or participate in the hiring, of
any Selected Firm Personnel or identify, or participate in the identification of, Selected Firm
Personnel for potential hiring whether as an employee or consultant or otherwise, or (B)&nbsp;Selected
Firm Personnel are Solicited, hired or accepted into partnership, membership or similar status (1)
by a
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-2-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Competitive Enterprise that you form, that bears your name, in which you are a partner, member
or have similar status, or in which you possess or control greater than a de minimis equity
ownership, voting or profit participation or (2)&nbsp;by any Competitive Enterprise where you have, or
are intended to have, direct or indirect managerial or supervisory responsibility for such Selected
Firm Personnel;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iv)&nbsp;you fail to certify to GS Inc., in accordance with procedures established by the
Committee, that you have complied, or the Committee determines that you in fact have failed to
comply, with all the terms and conditions of the Plan and this Award Agreement. By exercising any
<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Option under this Award Agreement, or by accepting the delivery of Shares under this
Award Agreement, you shall be deemed to have represented and certified at such time that you have
complied with all of the terms and conditions of the Plan and this Award Agreement;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(v)&nbsp;the Committee determines that you failed to meet, in any respect, any obligation you may
have under any agreement between you and the Firm, or any agreement entered into in connection with
your Employment with the Firm, including, without limitation, the Firm&#146;s notice period requirement
applicable to you, any offer letter, employment agreement or any shareholders&#146; agreement to which
other similarly situated employees of the Firm are a party; or
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(vi)&nbsp;as a result of any action brought by you, it is determined that any of the terms or
conditions for exercise of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options or delivery of Shares in respect thereto are
invalid.
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">For purposes of the foregoing, the term &#147;Selected Firm Personnel&#148; means: (i)&nbsp;any Firm employee or
consultant (A)&nbsp;with whom you personally worked while employed by the Firm, or (B)&nbsp;who at any time
during the year immediately preceding your termination of Employment with the Firm, worked in the
same division in which you worked; and (ii)&nbsp;any Managing Director of the Firm.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;Without limiting the application of Paragraph&nbsp;5(b), your Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
Year-End Options that become Vested in accordance with Paragraph&nbsp;4(c)(i) immediately shall
terminate, and such Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options shall cease to be Outstanding if, prior to
the original Vesting Date with respect to such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options, you (i)&nbsp;form, or acquire a 5%
or greater equity ownership, voting or profit participation interest in, any Competitive
Enterprise, or (ii)&nbsp;associate in any capacity (including, but not limited to, association as an
officer, employee, partner, director, consultant, agent or advisor) with any Competitive
Enterprise. Notwithstanding the foregoing, unless otherwise determined by the Committee in its
discretion, this Paragraph 5(c) will not apply if your termination of Employment by reason of
Extended Absence or Retirement is characterized by the Firm as &#147;involuntary&#148; or by &#147;mutual
agreement&#148; other than for Cause and if you execute such a general waiver and release of claims and
an agreement to pay any associated tax liability, both as may be prescribed by the Firm or its
designee. No termination of Employment initiated by you, including any termination claimed to be a
&#147;constructive termination&#148; or the like or a termination for good reason, will constitute an
&#147;involuntary&#148; termination of Employment or a termination of Employment by &#147;mutual agreement.&#148;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;6.&nbsp;<U>Exercisability of Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options</U>.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) <U>In General</U>. Only <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options that are Outstanding and Vested can be
exercised. Outstanding Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options must be exercised subject to Paragraph 6(e) and
in accordance with procedures established by the Committee from time to time but, subject to
Paragraphs 6(b), 6(d) and 10(g), not earlier than the Initial Exercise Date. The Initial Exercise
Date for your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options shall be a date specified by the Committee that is not more
than thirty (30)&nbsp;Business Days after the date listed on the Award Statement as the Initial Exercise
Date, if that date is during a Window Period or, if the date listed on the Award Statement is not
during a Window Period, on a date specified by the Committee that is not more than 30 Business Days
after the first Trading Day of the first Window Period that begins thereafter. For this purpose, a
&#147;Trading Day&#148; is a day on which Shares trade regular way on the New York Stock Exchange.
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-3-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The Committee may from time to time prescribe periods during which the Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End
Options shall not be exercisable. In addition, the exercise procedures established by the
Committee may require you to take specific steps in order to exercise your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options
within a minimum time prior to the effective date of exercise.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b) <U>Death</U>. Notwithstanding any other provision of this Award Agreement, if you die
and, at the time of your death, you have any Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options, the Transfer
Restrictions described in Paragraph 6(e) with respect to any <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options and any Shares
delivered in respect thereto shall be removed, and such Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options (i)&nbsp;shall
be exercisable by the representative of your estate or, to the extent you specifically bequeath any
of your Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options under your will in accordance with such procedures, if
any, as may be adopted by the Committee to an organization described in Sections&nbsp;501(c)(3) and
2055(a) of the Code (or such other similar charitable organization as may be approved by the
Committee) (a &#147;Charitable Beneficiary&#148;), by the Charitable Beneficiary, in either case in
accordance with Paragraph 6(a) beginning on the date that is as soon as practicable after the date
of death and after such documentation as may be requested by the Committee is provided to the
Committee and (ii)&nbsp;unless earlier terminated in accordance with the terms of this Award Agreement,
shall remain exercisable until the Expiration Date.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c) <U>Other Terminations of Employment</U>. Subject to Paragraphs 5(b) and 5(c), upon the
termination of your Employment for any reason (other than death or Cause), but subject to Paragraph
10(g), your then Outstanding Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options shall be exercisable in accordance with
Paragraph 6(a) beginning on the Initial Exercise Date and, unless earlier terminated in accordance
with the terms of this Award Agreement, shall remain exercisable until the Expiration Date.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d) <U>Change in Control</U>. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Award
Agreement, if a Change in Control shall occur, and within 18&nbsp;months thereafter the Firm terminates
your Employment without Cause or you terminate your Employment for Good Reason, as provided in
Paragraph&nbsp;4(d), all of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options that were Outstanding but that had not yet become
Vested immediately prior to your termination of Employment, shall become Vested, and all of your
Outstanding Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options shall become exercisable and, unless earlier terminated in
accordance with the terms of this Award Agreement, shall remain exercisable until the Expiration
Date and the Transfer Restrictions described in Paragraph 6(e) with respect to any <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End
Options and any Shares delivered in respect thereto shall be removed.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e) <U>Transfer Restrictions on Shares after Exercise</U>. Subject to Paragraphs 6(b), 6(d)
and 10(g), notwithstanding any other provision of this Award Agreement, (i) (A)&nbsp;no sale, exchange,
transfer, assignment, pledge, hypothecation, fractionalization, hedge or other disposition of
(including through the use of any cash-settled instrument) any Shares acquired in connection with
the exercise of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options, whether voluntarily or involuntarily by you; and (B)&nbsp;no
exercise of any <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options involving the sale of Shares acquired in respect of such
exercise (the restrictions in clauses (i)(A) and (i)(B) of this Paragraph 6(e) being referred to
collectively as the &#147;Transfer Restrictions&#148;) may be effected before the first anniversary of the
Initial Exercise Date (the &#147;Transferability Date&#148;), and any purported sale, exchange, transfer,
assignment, pledge, hypothecation, fractionalization, hedge, other disposition or exercise in
violation of the Transfer Restrictions shall be void; and (ii)&nbsp;if and to the extent Shares subject
to your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options are certificated, the certificates representing such Shares, shall
bear a legend specifying that such Shares are subject to the restrictions described in this
Paragraph 6(e) and GS Inc. shall advise its transfer agent to place a stop order against the
transfer of such Shares in violation of such Transfer Restrictions. Any Shares acquired in
connection with any exercise of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options prior to the Transferability Date shall
be held in the Custody Account or other account designated by the Firm. Within 30 Business Days
after the Transferability Date (or any other date for which removal of the Transfer Restrictions is
called for), GS Inc. shall take, or shall cause to be taken, such steps as may be necessary to
remove the Transfer Restrictions.
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-4-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.&nbsp;<U>Delivery</U>. Subject to Section&nbsp;6(e), unless otherwise determined by the Committee,
or as otherwise provided in this Award Agreement, including, without limitation, Paragraphs 10 and
11, after receipt of payment of the Exercise Price in respect of a <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Option, a Share
shall be delivered by book-entry credit to the Custody Account maintained by you, and until the
Transferability Date, shall be subject to the Transfer Restrictions. Notwithstanding the
foregoing, if you are or become considered by GS Inc. to be one of its &#147;covered employees&#148; within
the meaning of Section 162(m) of the Code, then you shall be subject to the provisions of Section
3.21.1 of the Plan, as a result of which delivery of your Shares may be delayed. In accordance
with Section&nbsp;1.3.2(h) of the Plan, in the discretion of the Committee, in lieu of all or any
portion of the Shares otherwise deliverable upon the exercise of all or any portion of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
Year-End Options, the Firm may deliver cash, other securities, other Awards or other property, and
all references in this Award Agreement to deliveries of Shares shall include such deliveries of
cash, other securities, other Awards or other property.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;8.&nbsp;<U>Repayment</U>. The provisions of Section&nbsp;2.3.5 of the Plan (which requires Award
recipients to repay to the Firm amounts delivered to them if the Committee determines that all
terms and conditions of this Award Agreement in respect of such exercise were not satisfied) shall
apply to this Award.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.&nbsp;<U>Non-transferability</U>. Except as otherwise may be provided in this Paragraph or as
otherwise may be provided by the Committee, and without limiting any permitted transfer in
accordance with Paragraph&nbsp;10(g), the limitations on transferability set forth in Section&nbsp;3.5 of the
Plan shall apply to this Award. Any purported transfer or assignment in violation of the
provisions of this Paragraph&nbsp;9 or Section&nbsp;3.5 of the Plan shall be void. The Committee may adopt
procedures pursuant to which some or all recipients of <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options may transfer some or
all of their <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options through a gift for no consideration to any child, stepchild,
grandchild, parent, stepparent, grandparent, spouse, sibling, niece, nephew, mother-in-law,
father-in-law, son-in-law, daughter-in-law, brother-in-law or sister-in-law, including adoptive
relationships, any person sharing the recipient&#146;s household (other than a tenant or employee), a
trust in which these persons have more than 50% of the beneficial interest, and any other entity in
which these persons (or the recipient) own more than 50% of the voting interests.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.&nbsp;<U>Certain Additional Terms, Conditions and Agreements</U>.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;The delivery of Shares upon exercise of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options is conditioned on your
satisfaction of any applicable withholding taxes in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.2 of the Plan. In
addition, if you are an individual with separate employment contracts (at any time during and/or
after the Firm&#146;s <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> fiscal year), the Firm may, in its sole discretion, require that that you
provide amounts for a reserve in connection with which the Firm may execute a sale for such number
of shares that may be deliverable in respect of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options(s) (or any other
Outstanding Awards under the Plan) as the Firm determines is advisable or necessary in connection
with any actual, anticipated or potential tax consequences related to your separate employment
contracts.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;If you are or become a Managing Director, your rights in respect of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End
Options are conditioned on your becoming a party to any shareholders&#146; agreement to which other
similarly situated employees of the Firm are a party.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;Your rights in respect of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options are conditioned on the receipt to the
full satisfaction of the Committee of any required consents (as described in Section&nbsp;3.3 of the
Plan) that the Committee may determine to be necessary or advisable.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;You understand and agree, in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.3 of the Plan, by accepting this
Award, you have expressly consented to all of the items listed in Section&nbsp;3.3.3(d) of the Plan,
which are incorporated herein by reference.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-5-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;You understand and agree, in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.22 of the Plan, by accepting this
Award you have agreed to be subject to the Firm&#146;s policies in effect from time to time concerning
trading in Shares, hedging or pledging Shares and equity-based compensation or other awards
(including, without limitation, the Firm&#146;s &#147;Policies With Respect to Transactions Involving GS
Shares, Equity Awards and GS Options by Persons Affiliated with GS Inc.&#148;), and confidential or
proprietary information, and to effect sales of Shares delivered to you in respect of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
Year-End Options in accordance with such rules and procedures as may be adopted from time to time
with respect to sales of such Shares (which may include, without limitation, restrictions relating
to the timing of sale requests, the manner in which sales are executed, pricing method,
consolidation or aggregation of orders and volume limits determined by the Firm). In addition, you
understand and agree that you shall be responsible for all brokerage costs and other fees or
expenses associated with your Award, including without limitation, such brokerage costs or other
fees or expenses in connection with the exercise of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options or the sale of
Shares delivered to you hereunder.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(f)&nbsp;Without limiting the application of Paragraph&nbsp;6(e), GS Inc. may affix to Certificates
representing Shares issued pursuant to this Award Agreement upon exercise of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End
Options any legend that the Committee determines to be necessary or advisable (including to reflect
any restrictions to which you may be subject under a separate agreement with GS Inc.). GS Inc. may
advise the transfer agent to place a stop order against any legended Shares.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(g)&nbsp;Without limiting the application of Paragraph&nbsp;5(b), if:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;your Employment with the Firm terminates solely because you resigned to accept employment
at any U.S. Federal, state or local government, any non-U.S. government, any supranational or
international organization, any self-regulatory organization, or any agency or instrumentality of
any such government or organization, or any other employer determined by the Committee, and as a
result of such employment your continued holding of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options would result in an
actual or perceived conflict of interest (&#147;Conflicted Employment&#148;); or
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;following your termination of Employment other than described in Paragraph&nbsp;10(g)(i), you
notify the Firm that you have accepted or intend to accept Conflicted Employment at a time when you
continue to hold Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options that are Vested;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">then, in the case of Paragraph&nbsp;10(g)(i) above, the condition set forth in Paragraph 5(a) shall be
waived with respect to any <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options you then hold that had not yet become Vested (as a
result of which such
<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options shall become Vested) and, in the cases of Paragraphs
10(g)(i) and 10(g)(ii) above, at the sole discretion of the Firm, (a)&nbsp;such Outstanding Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
Year-End Options shall be cancelled and as soon as practicable after the Committee has received
satisfactory documentation relating to your Conflicted Employment (the &#147;Release Date&#148;) you shall
receive a payment equal to the excess (if any) of (x)&nbsp;the Fair Market Value of a Share on the
Business Day immediately prior to the Release Date multiplied by the number of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End
Options that were Outstanding and Vested immediately prior to such cancellation over (y)&nbsp;the
Exercise Price multiplied by the number of such Outstanding Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options; (b)&nbsp;both
the Initial Exercise Date and Transferability Date shall become the Release Date or (c)&nbsp;if and to
the extent provided in any procedures adopted by the Committee, you may be permitted to transfer
your Outstanding Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options for value to a party or parties acceptable to the
Firm (which may include the Firm). Notwithstanding anything else herein, the actions described in
this Paragraph&nbsp;10(g) shall be permitted only at such time and if and to the extent as would not
result in the imposition of any additional tax to you under Section&nbsp;409A of the Code (which governs
the taxation of certain deferred compensation).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;11.&nbsp;<U>Right of Offset</U>. The obligation to deliver Shares under this Award Agreement upon
exercise of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End Options is subject to Section&nbsp;3.4 of the Plan, which provides for
the Firm&#146;s right to offset against such obligation any outstanding amounts you owe to the Firm and
any amounts the Committee deems appropriate pursuant to any tax equalization policy or agreement.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-6-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;12.&nbsp;<U>Amendment</U>. The Committee reserves the right at any time to amend the terms and
conditions set forth in this Award Agreement, and the Board may amend the Plan in any respect;
provided that, notwithstanding the foregoing and Sections&nbsp;1.3.2(f), 1.3.2(g) and 3.1 of the Plan,
no such amendment shall materially adversely affect your rights and obligations under this Award
Agreement without your consent; and provided further that the Committee expressly reserves its
rights to amend the Award Agreement and the Plan as described in
<FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sections&nbsp;1.3.2(h)(1)</font>, (2)&nbsp;and (4)
of the Plan. Any amendment of this Award Agreement shall be in writing signed by an authorized
member of the Committee or a person or persons designated by the Committee.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;13.&nbsp;<U>Arbitration; Choice of Forum</U>. <B>BY ACCEPTING THIS AWARD, YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE
THAT THE ARBITRATION AND CHOICE OF FORUM PROVISIONS SET FORTH IN SECTION 3.17 OF THE PLAN, WHICH
ARE EXPRESSLY INCORPORATED HEREIN BY REFERENCE AND WHICH, AMONG OTHER THINGS, PROVIDE THAT ANY
DISPUTE, CONTROVERSY OR CLAIM BETWEEN THE FIRM AND YOU ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO OR CONCERNING
THE PLAN OR THIS AWARD AGREEMENT SHALL BE FINALLY SETTLED BY ARBITRATION IN NEW YORK CITY, PURSUANT
TO THE TERMS MORE FULLY SET FORTH IN SECTION 3.17 OF THE PLAN, SHALL APPLY.</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;14.&nbsp;<U>Governing Law</U>. <B>THIS AWARD SHALL BE GOVERNED BY AND CONSTRUED IN ACCORDANCE WITH
THE LAWS OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, WITHOUT REGARD TO PRINCIPLES OF CONFLICT OF LAWS.</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;15.&nbsp;<U>Headings</U>. The headings in this Award Agreement are for the purpose of convenience
only and are not intended to define or limit the construction of the provisions hereof.
</DIV>



<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-7-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>


<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>IN WITNESS WHEREOF</B>, GS Inc. has caused this Award Agreement to be duly executed and delivered
as of the Date of Grant.
</DIV>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.37
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>y29219exv10w37.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.37: FORM OF YEAR-END RSU AWARD AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>EX-10.37</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 9pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>EXHIBIT&nbsp;10.37</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>THE GOLDMAN SACHS AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
STOCK INCENTIVE PLAN<BR>
<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> YEAR-END RSU AWARD</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Award Agreement sets forth the terms and conditions of the <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End award (this
&#147;Award&#148;) of RSUs (&#147;<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs&#148;) granted to you under The Goldman Sachs Amended and Restated
Stock Incentive Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.&nbsp;<U>The Plan</U>. This Award is made pursuant to the Plan, the terms of which are
incorporated in this Award Agreement. Capitalized terms used in this Award Agreement that are not
defined in this Award Agreement have the meanings as used or defined in the Plan. References in
this Award Agreement to any specific Plan provision shall not be construed as limiting the
applicability of any other Plan provision.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.&nbsp;<U>Award</U>. The number of <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs subject to this Award is set forth in the
Award Statement delivered to you. An RSU is an unfunded and unsecured promise to deliver (or cause
to be delivered) to you, subject to the terms and conditions of this Award Agreement, a share of
Common Stock (a &#147;Share&#148;) on the Delivery Date or as otherwise provided herein. Until such
delivery, you have only the rights of a general unsecured creditor, and no rights as a shareholder
of GS Inc. <FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>This Award is conditioned on your executing the related signature card and
returning it to the address designated on the signature card and/or by the method designated on the
signature card by the date specified, and is subject to all terms, conditions and provisions of the
Plan and this Award Agreement, including, without limitation, the arbitration and choice of forum
provisions set forth in Paragraph&nbsp;12</B></FONT>. <FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>By executing the related signature card (which,
among other things, opens the custody account referred to in paragraph 3(</B></FONT><B>b</B><FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>) if you have
not done so already), you will have confirmed your acceptance of all of the terms and conditions of
this Award Agreement.</B></FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.&nbsp;<U>Vesting and Delivery</U>.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) <U>Vesting</U>. Except as provided in this Paragraph&nbsp;3 and in Paragraphs 4, 6, 7, 9, 10
and 15, on each Vesting Date you shall become Vested in the number or percentage of <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End
RSUs specified next to such Vesting Date on the Award Statement (which may be rounded to avoid
fractional Shares). While continued active Employment is not required in order to receive delivery
of the Shares underlying your Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs that are or become Vested, all other
terms and conditions of this Award Agreement shall continue to apply to such Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End
RSUs, and failure to meet such terms and conditions may result in the termination of this Award (as
a result of which no Shares underlying such Vested <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs would be delivered).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b) <U>Delivery</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The Delivery Date with respect to this Award shall be the date specified as such on your
Award Statement, if that date is during a Window Period or, if that date is not during a Window
Period, the first Trading Day of the first Window Period beginning after such date. For this
purpose, a &#147;Trading Day&#148; is a day on which Shares trade regular way on the New York Stock Exchange.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii) Except as provided in this Paragraph&nbsp;3 and in Paragraphs 4, 6, 7, 9, 10 and 15, in
accordance with Section&nbsp;3.23 of the Plan, reasonably promptly (but in no case more than thirty (30)
Business Days) after the date specified as the Delivery Date (or any other date delivery of Shares
is called for hereunder), Shares underlying the number or percentage of your then Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
Year-End RSUs with respect to which the Delivery Date (or other date) has occurred (which number of
Shares may be rounded to
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">avoid fractional Shares) shall be delivered by book entry credit to your Custody Account or to a
brokerage account approved by the Firm. Notwithstanding the foregoing, if you are or become
considered by GS Inc. to be one of its &#147;covered employees&#148; within the meaning of Section&nbsp;162(m) of
the Code, then you shall be subject to Section&nbsp;3.21.3 of the Plan, as a result of which delivery of
your Shares may be delayed.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;In accordance with Section&nbsp;1.3.2(i) of the Plan, in the discretion of the
Committee, in lieu of all or any portion of the Shares otherwise deliverable in respect of all or
any portion of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs, the Firm may deliver cash, other securities, other Awards
or other property, and all references in this Award Agreement to deliveries of Shares shall include
such deliveries of cash, other securities, other Awards or other property.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c) <U>Death</U>. Notwithstanding any other Paragraph of this Award Agreement, if you die
prior to the Delivery Date, the Shares underlying your then Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs shall be
delivered to the representative of your estate as soon as practicable after the date of death and
after such documentation as may be requested by the Committee is provided to the Committee. The
Committee may adopt procedures pursuant to which you may be permitted to specifically bequeath some
or all of your Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs under your will to an organization described in
Sections&nbsp;501(c)(3) and 2055(a) of the Code (or such other similar charitable organization as may be
approved by the Committee).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.&nbsp;<U>Termination of <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs and Non-Delivery of Shares</U>.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;Unless the Committee determines otherwise, and except as provided in Paragraphs 3(c), 6,
7, and 9, if your Employment terminates for any reason or you otherwise are no longer actively
employed with the Firm, your rights in respect of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs that were Outstanding but
that had not yet become Vested immediately prior to your termination of Employment immediately
shall terminate, such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs shall cease to be Outstanding and no Shares shall be
delivered in respect thereof.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;Unless the Committee determines otherwise, and except as provided in Paragraphs 6 and 7,
your rights in respect of all of your Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs (whether or not Vested) shall
immediately terminate, such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs shall cease to be Outstanding and no Shares shall be
delivered in respect thereof if:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;you attempt to have any dispute under the Plan or this Award Agreement resolved in any
manner that is not provided for by Paragraph&nbsp;12 or Section&nbsp;3.17 of the Plan;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;any event that constitutes Cause has occurred;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii) (A)&nbsp;you, in any manner, directly or indirectly, (1)&nbsp;Solicit any Client to transact
business with a Competitive Enterprise or to reduce or refrain from doing any business with the
Firm, (2)&nbsp;interfere with or damage (or attempt to interfere with or damage) any relationship
between the Firm and any Client, (3)&nbsp;Solicit any person who is an employee of the Firm to resign
from the Firm or to apply for or accept employment with any Competitive Enterprise or (4)&nbsp;on behalf
of yourself or any person or Competitive Enterprise hire, or participate in the hiring of, any
Selected Firm Personnel or identify, or participate in the identification of, Selected Firm
Personnel for potential hiring, whether as an employee or consultant or otherwise, or (B)&nbsp;Selected
Firm Personnel are Solicited, hired or accepted into partnership, membership or similar status (1)
by a Competitive Enterprise that you form, that bears your name, in which you are a partner, member
or have similar status, or in which you possess or control greater than a de minimis equity
ownership, voting or profit participation or (2)&nbsp;by any Competitive Enterprise where you have, or
are intended to have, direct or indirect managerial or supervisory responsibility for such Selected
Firm Personnel;
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-2-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iv)&nbsp;you fail to certify to GS Inc., in accordance with procedures established by the
Committee, that you have complied, or the Committee determines that you in fact have failed to
comply, with
all the terms and conditions of the Plan and this Award Agreement. By accepting the delivery
of Shares under this Award Agreement, you shall be deemed to have represented and certified at such
time that you have complied with all the terms and conditions of the Plan and this Award Agreement;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(v)&nbsp;the Committee determines that you failed to meet, in any respect, any obligation you may
have under any agreement between you and the Firm, or any agreement entered into in connection with
your Employment with the Firm, including, without limitation, the Firm&#146;s notice period requirement
applicable to you, any offer letter, employment agreement or any shareholders&#146; agreement to which
other similarly situated employees of the Firm are a party; or
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(vi)&nbsp;as a result of any action brought by you, it is determined that any of the terms or
conditions for delivery of Shares in respect of this Award Agreement are invalid.
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">For purposes of the foregoing, the term &#147;Selected Firm Personnel&#148; means: (i)&nbsp;any Firm employee or
consultant (A)&nbsp;with whom you personally worked while employed by the Firm, or (B)&nbsp;who at any time
during the year immediately preceding your termination of Employment with the Firm, worked in the
same division in which you worked; and (ii)&nbsp;any Managing Director of the Firm.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.&nbsp;<U>Repayment</U>. The provisions of Section&nbsp;2.6.3 of the Plan (which requires Award
recipients to repay to the Firm amounts delivered to them if the Committee determines that all
terms and conditions of this Award Agreement in respect of such delivery were not satisfied) shall
apply to this Award.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;6.&nbsp;<U>Extended Absence, Retirement and Downsizing. </U>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of this Award Agreement, but subject to Paragraph
6(b), in the event of the termination of your Employment (determined as described in Section&nbsp;1.2.19
of the Plan) by reason of Extended Absence or Retirement, the condition set forth in Paragraph 4(a)
shall be waived with respect to any <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs that were Outstanding but that had not yet
become Vested immediately prior to such termination of Employment (as a result of which such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
Year-End RSUs shall become Vested), but all other conditions of this Award Agreement shall continue
to apply.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;Without limiting the application of Paragraph&nbsp;4(b), your rights in respect of your
Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs that become Vested in accordance with Paragraph 6(a) immediately
shall terminate, such Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs shall cease to be Outstanding, and no Shares
shall be delivered in respect thereof if, prior to the original Vesting Date with respect to such
<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs, you (i)&nbsp;form, or acquire a 5% or greater equity ownership, voting or profit
participation interest in, any Competitive Enterprise, or (ii)&nbsp;associate in any capacity
(including, but not limited to, association as an officer, employee, partner, director, consultant,
agent or advisor) with any Competitive Enterprise. Notwithstanding the foregoing, unless otherwise
determined by the Committee in its discretion, this Paragraph 6(b) will not apply if your
termination of Employment by reason of Extended Absence or Retirement is characterized by the Firm
as &#147;involuntary&#148; or by &#147;mutual agreement&#148; other than for Cause and if you execute such a general
waiver and release of claims and an agreement to pay any associated tax liability, both as may be
prescribed by the Firm or its designee. No termination of Employment initiated by you, including
any termination claimed to be a &#147;constructive termination&#148; or the like or a termination for good
reason, will constitute an &#147;involuntary&#148; termination of Employment or a termination of Employment
by &#147;mutual agreement.&#148;
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of this Award Agreement and subject to your executing
such general waiver and release of claims and an agreement to pay any associated tax liability,
both as may be prescribed by the Firm or its designee, if your Employment is terminated without
Cause solely by reason of a &#147;downsizing,&#148; the condition set forth in Paragraph 4(a) shall be waived
with respect to
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-3-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">your
<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs that were Outstanding but that had not yet become Vested
immediately prior to such termination of Employment (as a result of which such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs
shall become Vested), but all other conditions of
this Award Agreement shall continue to apply. Whether or not your Employment is terminated
solely by reason of a &#147;downsizing&#148; shall be determined by the Firm in its sole discretion. No
termination of Employment initiated by you, including any termination claimed to be a &#147;constructive
termination&#148; or the like or a termination for good reason, will be solely by reason of a
&#147;downsizing.&#148;
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.&nbsp;<U>Change in Control</U>. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Award
Agreement, in the event a Change in Control shall occur and within 18&nbsp;months thereafter the Firm
terminates your Employment without Cause or you terminate your Employment for Good Reason, all
Shares underlying your then Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs, whether or not Vested, shall be
delivered.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;8.&nbsp;<U>Dividend Equivalent Rights</U>. Each <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSU shall include a Dividend
Equivalent Right. Accordingly, with respect to each of your Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs, at or
after the time of distribution of any regular cash dividend paid by GS Inc. in respect of a Share
the record date for which occurs on or after the Date of Grant, you shall be entitled to receive an
amount (less applicable withholding) equal to such regular dividend payment as would have been made
in respect of the Share underlying such Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSU. Payment in respect of a
Dividend Equivalent Right shall be made only with respect to <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs that are
Outstanding on the payment date. Each Dividend Equivalent Right shall be subject to the provisions
of Section&nbsp;2.8.2 of the Plan.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.&nbsp;<U>Certain Additional Terms, Conditions and Agreements</U>.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;The delivery of Shares is conditioned on your satisfaction of any applicable withholding
taxes in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.2 of the Plan. In addition, if you are an individual with
separate employment contracts (at any time during and/or after the Firm&#146;s <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> fiscal year), the
Firm may, in its sole discretion, require that that you provide amounts for a reserve in connection
with which the Firm may execute a sale for such number of Shares that may be deliverable in respect
of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs (or any other Outstanding Awards under the Plan) as the Firm determines
is advisable or necessary in connection with any actual, anticipated or potential tax consequences
related to your separate employment contracts.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;If you are or become a Managing Director, your rights in respect of the <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs
are conditioned on your becoming a party to any shareholders&#146; agreement to which other similarly
situated employees of the Firm are a party.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;Your rights in respect of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs are conditioned on the receipt to the
full satisfaction of the Committee of any required consents (as described in Section&nbsp;3.3 of the
Plan) that the Committee may determine to be necessary or advisable.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;You understand and agree, in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.3 of the Plan, by accepting this
Award, you have expressly consented to all of the items listed in Section&nbsp;3.3.3(d) of the Plan,
which are incorporated herein by reference.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;You understand and agree, in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.22 of the Plan, by accepting this
Award you have agreed to be subject to the Firm&#146;s policies in effect from time to time concerning
trading in Shares and hedging or pledging Shares and equity-based compensation or other awards
(including, without limitation, the Firm&#146;s &#147;Policies With Respect to Transactions Involving GS
Shares, Equity Awards and GS Options by Persons Affiliated with GS Inc.&#148;), and confidential or
proprietary information, and to effect sales of Shares delivered to you in respect of your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
Year-End RSUs in accordance with such rules and procedures as may be adopted from time to time with
respect to sales of such Shares (which may include, without limitation, restrictions relating to
the timing of sale requests, the manner in which sales are executed, pricing method, consolidation
or aggregation of orders and volume limits determined by the Firm). In addition,
</DIV>
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-4-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">you understand
and agree that you shall be responsible for all brokerage costs and other fees or expenses
associated with your <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSU Award, including without limitation, such brokerage costs or other fees or
expenses in connection with the sale of Shares delivered to you hereunder.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(f)&nbsp;GS Inc. may affix to Certificates representing Shares issued pursuant to this Award
Agreement any legend that the Committee determines to be necessary or advisable (including to
reflect any restrictions to which you may be subject under a separate agreement with GS Inc.). GS
Inc. may advise the transfer agent to place a stop order against any legended Shares.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(g)&nbsp;Without limiting the application of Paragraph&nbsp;4(b), if:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;your Employment with the Firm terminates solely because you resigned to accept employment
at any U.S. Federal, state or local government, any non-U.S. government, any supranational or
international organization, any self-regulatory organization or any agency, or instrumentality of
any such government or organization, or any other employer determined by the Committee, and as a
result of such employment, your continued holding of your Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs would
result in an actual or perceived conflict of interest (&#147;Conflicted Employment&#148;); or
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;following your termination of Employment other than described in Paragraph&nbsp;9(g)(i), you
notify the Firm that you have accepted or intend to accept Conflicted Employment at a time when you
continue to hold Outstanding <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs;
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">then, in the case of Paragraph&nbsp;9(g)(i) above, the condition set forth in Paragraph 4(a) shall be
waived with respect to any <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs you then hold that had not yet become Vested (as a
result of which such <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs shall become Vested) and, in the case of Paragraphs 9(g)(i)
and 9(g)(ii) above, at the sole discretion of the Firm you shall receive either a lump sum cash
payment in respect of, or delivery of Shares underlying, your then Vested Outstanding Year-End
RSUs, in each case as soon as practicable after the Committee has received satisfactory
documentation relating to your Conflicted Employment. Notwithstanding anything else herein,
payment or delivery in respect of <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs as a result of this Paragraph 9(g) shall be
made only at such time and if and to the extent as would not result in the imposition of any
additional tax to you under Section&nbsp;409A of the Code (which governs the taxation of certain
deferred compensation).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.&nbsp;<U>Right of Offset</U>. The obligation to deliver Shares under this Award Agreement is
subject to Section&nbsp;3.4 of the Plan, which provides for the Firm&#146;s right to offset against such
obligation any outstanding amounts you owe to the Firm and any amounts the Committee deems
appropriate pursuant to any tax equalization policy or agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;11.&nbsp;<U>Amendment</U>. The Committee reserves the right at any time to amend the terms and
conditions set forth in this Award Agreement, and the Board may amend the Plan in any respect;
provided that, notwithstanding the foregoing and Sections&nbsp;1.3.2(f), 1.3.2(g) and 3.1 of the Plan,
no such amendment shall materially adversely affect your rights and obligations under this Award
Agreement without your consent; and provided further that the Committee expressly reserves its
rights to amend the Award Agreement and the Plan as described in <BR>Sections&nbsp;1.3.2(h)(1),&nbsp;(2)&nbsp;and (4)
of the Plan. Any amendment of this Award Agreement shall be in writing signed by an authorized
member of the Committee or a person or persons designated by the Committee.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;12.&nbsp;<U>Arbitration; Choice of Forum</U>. <B>BY ACCEPTING THIS AWARD, YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE
THAT THE ARBITRATION AND CHOICE OF FORUM PROVISIONS SET FORTH IN SECTION 3.17 OF THE PLAN, WHICH
ARE EXPRESSLY INCORPORATED HEREIN BY REFERENCE AND WHICH, AMONG OTHER THINGS, PROVIDE THAT ANY
DISPUTE, CONTROVERSY OR CLAIM BETWEEN THE FIRM AND YOU ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO OR CONCERNING
THE PLAN OR THIS AWARD AGREEMENT SHALL BE</B>
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-5-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>FINALLY SETTLED BY ARBITRATION IN NEW YORK CITY, PURSUANT
TO THE TERMS MORE FULLY SET FORTH IN SECTION 3.17 OF THE PLAN, SHALL APPLY.</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;13.&nbsp;<U>Non-transferability</U>. Except as otherwise may be provided in this Paragraph or as
otherwise may be provided by the Committee, the limitations on transferability set forth in Section
3.5 of the Plan shall apply to this Award. Any purported transfer or assignment in violation of
the provisions of this Paragraph&nbsp;13 or Section&nbsp;3.5 of the Plan shall be void. The Committee may
adopt procedures pursuant to which some or all recipients of <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs may transfer some
or all of their <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u> Year-End RSUs through a gift for no consideration to any child, stepchild,
grandchild, parent, stepparent, grandparent, spouse, sibling, niece, nephew, mother-in-law,
father-in-law, son-in-law, daughter-in-law, brother-in-law or sister-in-law, including adoptive
relationships, any person sharing the recipient&#146;s household (other than a tenant or employee), a
trust in which these persons have more than 50% of the beneficial interest, and any other entity in
which these persons (or the recipient) own more than 50% of the voting interests.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;14.&nbsp;<U>Governing Law</U>. <B>THIS AWARD SHALL BE GOVERNED BY AND CONSTRUED IN ACCORDANCE WITH
THE LAWS OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, WITHOUT REGARD TO PRINCIPLES OF CONFLICT OF LAWS.</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;15.&nbsp;<U>Delay in Payment</U>. To the extent required in order to avoid the imposition of any
interest and/or additional tax under <BR>Section&nbsp;409A(a)(1)(B)&nbsp;of the Code, any payments or deliveries
due as a result a your termination of Employment with the Firm may be delayed for six months if you
are deemed to be a &#147;specified employee&#148; as defined in Section&nbsp;409A(a)(2)(i)(B) of the Code.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;16.&nbsp;<U>Headings</U>. The headings in this Award Agreement are for the purpose of convenience
only and are not intended to define or limit the construction of the provisions hereof.
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-6-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
\<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>IN WITNESS WHEREOF</B>, GS Inc. has caused this Award Agreement to be duly executed and delivered
as of the Date of Grant.
</DIV>
